-OOC- Okay sorry about how late this is I havent had
much time for computer in the last 24 hours!!-

  The bridge doors hissed open.Panzertron walked onto
the bridge.

  "Sorry about the wait Megatron," Panzertron said," I
had a small matter to attend to."

  Clanging sounds could be heard echoing through the
ship.

  "What is that?" Megatron asked uneasily.

  Panzertron waved it off," Precautionary messaures,
not against you. It's in case someone gets ambitious
while they think the crew is distarcted with your
presence. I just had every compartment sealed leading
below decks."

 " Will that stop them?" Megatron asked.

  "Of course," Panzertron said," Every door is locked
with a duracypertrioum lock. It's unhackable with out
setting off the ship's alarms. Each door is a meter
thick, so they won't blast through them."

  Megatron nodded," Seems you like precaution."

  "More then you know," Panzertron said. He waved his
hand around thie bridge," This ship is secure against
anything, given time. Anyone attacking will have only
minicylces to make sure it works before the ship
defenses kick in. Unless of course the oppoents of
this world are very creative."

  "Don't be over confident," Megatron said," The
opponets of this world are creative."


-OOC- Panzertron is boasting about his ship. Like the
"Super-battleships" of WW2 the Iron Fist isn't
perfect.-
